params.newGuardian: The address of the new guardian to add

getEjectionThreshold().details: The ejection threshold is the minimum amount of ETH on the beacon chain required do the validation duties If it drops below this value, the validator will be ejected It is more likely that the validator will run out of Validator Tickets before its balance drops below this value

getGuardians().details: This function returns an array of addresses representing the guardians

returns._0: An array of addresses representing the guardians

getThreshold().details: The threshold value is the minimum number of guardian signatures required for a transaction to be considered valid

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the account is a guardian

params.guardian: The address of the guardian to remove

rotateGuardianKey(uint256,bytes,(bytes,b.details: If he caller is not a valid guardian or if the RAVE evidence is not valid the tx will revert

params.pubKey: is the public key of the new signature

validateBatchWithdrawals((address,uint25.details: The order of the signatures is important The order of the signatures MUST the same as the order of the validators in the validator module

params.validatorInfos: The information of the stopped validators

validateGuardiansEOASignatures(bytes[],b.details: Validates the signatures of the guardians' EOAs.

params.signedMessageHash: The hash of the signed message.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the signatures are valid.

validateGuardiansEnclaveSignatures(bytes.details: Validates the signatures of the guardians' enclave signatures

params.signedMessageHash: The hash of the signed message

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the signatures are valid

validateProvisionNode(uint256,bytes,byte.details: The order of the signatures is important The order of the signatures MUST the same as the order of the guardians in the guardian module

params.pufferModuleIndex: is the validator index in Puffer

params.skippedIndex: The index of the skipped provisioning

addGuardian(address).notice: Adds a new guardian to the module

getEjectionThreshold().notice: Returns the ejection threshold ETH value

getGuardiansEnclaveAddress(address).notice: Returns the enclave address registered to `guardian`

getGuardiansEnclavePubkeys().notice: Returns the guardians enclave public keys

getThreshold().notice: Returns the threshold value for guardian signatures

isGuardian(address).notice: Checks if an account is a guardian

removeGuardian(address).notice: Removes a guardian from the module

setGuardianEnclaveMeasurements(bytes32,b.notice: Sets the values for mrEnclave and mrSigner to `newMrenclave` and `newMrsigner`

setThreshold(uint256).notice: Changes the threshold value for the guardian signatures

validateSkipProvisioning(bytes32,uint256.notice: Validates the skipping of provisioning for a specific module

validateTotalNumberOfValidators(uint256,.notice: Validates the update of the number of validators
